name: Jelly Escape
description: The adventures of the cute jelly left in search of freedom! You have to run, run and use the traps and various objects to get into the black hole to take you to the next level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 or newer Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: default
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 or newer Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: default
